caption.p:
Comparison of acute alcoholism in mice: β-EP and LENK levels among groups. (a) β-EP; (b) LENK. Control: the group without alcohol or any drugs. Model: the group cured with alcohol only. RU-21: the positive control group cured with RU-21 before alcohol. CTR: the experiment group cured with the CTR before alcohol. ▲ P < 0.05 p < 0.05 compared with the control group,
∗
p < 0.05 compared with the model group, and ◆ p < 0.05 compared with the RU-21 group.
